string-array.name: v87
string-array.item: IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Control scrollbar color and size, shrink the rectangular width
Add black into toggle circle (remove transparency so track doesn\'t show through)
Update Theme Chooser Overlay (Uninstall icon, drawer ripple)
Update Google Now Launcher (Android M preview)
Update Bluetooth connected state QS toggle icon
Stroke Airplane Mode Status Bar Icon
Speed up Superuser status bar animation
Add CDMA Roaming Icon to status bar
Adjust all QS icons with a fully greyed out base PNG, allowing ROMs with QS disabled toggles as white to be grey as well.
Remove unnecessary XML reroutes for Heads Up Icon
Increase quality of progress circles thanks to Bella!
